alert.note: Alert for Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 30 at 11:45AM MDT until March 31 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. Winds turn northwesterly overnight into Friday morning. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood. * WHEN...Until 7 PM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.
